hero.title: About AyaPos
hero.subtitle: We are an innovative company dedicated to the digital transformation of the restaurant industry. Our mission: to simplify the management of your establishment with modern and intuitive POS solutions.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2010, AyaPos was born from the desire to modernize the restaurant sector. We began with a simple vision: to create technological tools accessible to all restaurateurs, regardless of the size of their establishment.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we have developed a comprehensive suite of POS solutions that combine innovation, ease of use, and reliability. Our systems now equip over 5000 restaurants, cafés, bars, and establishments across France and Europe.
story.paragraph3: Our passionate team works every day to improve our products and support our clients in their success. We believe that technology should serve people, not the other way around.
